alert.note: Alert for Ashland; Bayfield; Douglas (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 28 at 1:57PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...BRIEF PERIOD OF HEAVY SNOW THROUGH EARLY AFTERNOON... At 155 PM a band of heavy snow stretched from near International Falls to Virginia to French River to Maple, WI to Cable, WI. The band of snow was moving north-northeast at 25 mph. Visibility as low as one-tenth of a mile was reported in the heavy snow. Through 4 pm the band of snow will impact the Minnesota communities of International Falls, Virginia, Ely, Brimson, Two Harbors, Silver Bay, and Isabella. In Wisconsin the snow will impact Port Wing, Cornucopia, Bayfield, Iron River, Ashland, and Mellen. Roadways impacted include US Highway 53 between International Falls and Virginia, MN, MN Highway 1 between Cook and Silver Bay, MN Highway 61 between Duluth and Silver Bay, US Highway 2 between Superior and Ashland, WI, and WI Highway 13 between Superior and Ashland. Visibility of less than one-quarter mile, particularly over northeast Minnesota, and snow accumulation on roads are expected. Be prepared for reduced visibility and snow covered and slippery roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.
